title: Workflow Metadata

analytical_fraction.description: Type of peptide or protein enrichment

cdap_reports.description: Name and version of the tool used to generate protein summary reports

cptac_dcc_mzidentml.description: Name and version of the tool used to generate mzIdentML from the peptide spectral match report

cptac_dcc_tools.description: Name and version of the custom scripts used in the data analysis pipeline

cptac_galaxy_tools.description: Name and version of the custom scripts used in the data analysis pipeline

cptac_galaxy_workflows.description: Name and version of the workflow of data analysis pipeline

experiment_type.description: General strategy used for differential analysis

gene_to_prot.description: Name and version of the tool used to map gene to protein in the data analysis pipeline

hgnc_version.description: Name and version of HGNC database of human gene names used in the data analysis pipeline

instrument.description: Make and model of the mass spectrometry instrument

ms1_data_analysis.description: Name and version of the tool used for MS1 data analysis

mzidentml_refseq.description: Name and version of the NCBI Refseq database used in mzIdentML

mzidentml_uniprot.description: Name and version of the Uniprot Refseq database used in mzIdentiML

phosphosite_localization.description: Name and version of the tool used for phosphosite localization

psm_report_generation.description: Name and version of the tool used to peptide spectral match report generation

raw_data_conversion.description: Name and version of the tool used to convert the proprietary data into open format

raw_data_processing.description: Name and version of the tool used to process the proprietary raw data

refseq_database_version.description: Name and version of the NCBI Refseq database used in the data analysis pipeline

search_database_parameters.description: Parameters used in the peptide identification database search

sequence_database_search.description: Name and version of the tool used in peptide identification by scoring MS/MS spectra against peptides derived from a protein sequence database

uniport_database_version.description: Name and version of the Uniprot Refseq database used in the data analysis pipeline

description: Tools, versions and parameters used in data analysis pipeline/workflow for analyzing study data.

links.label: Workflow Metadata references the pipeline used to analyze the Study.
links.name: Study
